    • err :: Text
    }

data HydraNodeLog
  • = HydraNodeCommandSpec {
    • cmd :: Text
    }
  • | NodeStarted {
    • nodeId :: Int
    }
  • | SentMessage {
    • nodeId :: Int
    • message :: Value
    }
  • | StartWaiting {
    • nodeIds :: [Int]
    • messages :: [Value]
    }
  • | ReceivedMessage {
    • nodeId :: Int
    • message :: Value
    }
  • | EndWaiting {
    • nodeId :: Int
    }
name: HydraNodeLog $sel:nodeIds:HydraNodeCommandSpec $sel:cmd:HydraNodeCommandSpec $sel:messages:HydraNodeCommandSpec $sel:message:HydraNodeCommandSpec $sel:nodeId:HydraNodeCommandSpec NodeStarted HydraNodeCommandSpec EndWaiting StartWaiting ReceivedMessage SentMessage

display_html:
data EndToEndLog
  • = ClusterOptions {
    • options :: Options
    }
  • | FromCardanoNode NodeLog
  • | FromFaucet FaucetLog
  • | FromHydraNode HydraNodeLog
  • | FromMithril MithrilLog
  • | StartingFunds {
    • actor :: String
    • utxo :: UTxO
    }
  • | RefueledFunds {
    • actor :: String
    • refuelingAmount :: Coin
    • utxo :: UTxO
    }
  • | RemainingFunds {
    • actor :: String
    • utxo :: UTxO
    }
  • | PublishedHydraScriptsAt {
    • hydraScriptsTxId :: [TxId]
    }
  • | UsingHydraScriptsAt {
    • hydraScriptsTxId :: [TxId]
    }
  • | CreatedKey {
    • keyPath :: FilePath
    }
name: EndToEndLog $sel:keyPath:ClusterOptions $sel:refuelingAmount:ClusterOptions $sel:actor:ClusterOptions $sel:hydraScriptsTxId:ClusterOptions $sel:utxo:ClusterOptions $sel:options:ClusterOptions CreatedKey UsingHydraScriptsAt PublishedHydraScriptsAt RemainingFunds RefueledFunds StartingFunds FromMithril FromHydraNode FromFaucet FromCardanoNode ClusterOptions
